text: This is presenting a complete list in alphabetical order of the cricketers who have played for the Bangladesh national under-19 cricket team. Like other team lists, details are the player's name followed by his years active in the Under-19 team, current players to the end of the 2015–16 season. Please to note that the list includes players who have not (yet) gone on to appear in first-class or List A cricket. These players' names are unlinked, as Under-19 players only they are not complying with WP:NCRIC. ==A== * MD RABIUL ISLAM ROBI (2014–15 to 2015–16) * Abdul Qayium (2014) * Abdur Rashid (2010–11) * Abu
